item.title: Augmented Flute
item.description: Why play a regular old flute when you can augment it using computers? An exploration for thc212 research presentation We all know and treasure the flute: the physics of resonating sound waves inside of the chamber, how daunting all the keys look to the inexperienced player, and how it is still used in modern music.

item.title: COMUN RADIO
item.description: In a country where most radio stations only look for music overseas, a vaccuum for the promotion of national talent served as motivation to start Comun Radio, a community radio based in Lima, Peru.

item.title: LIGHTS
item.description: Description: lights as firmata output Inspiration: music shows about exploration: relays, software, Bill of Materials (final) Making: Eval: End

item.title: sousveillance1 - allday transcriber
